name: Bye Bye Under Eye Full Coverage Anti-Aging Waterproof Concealer
about: What it is: A 24HR waterproof + full-coverage concealer for dark circles and hyperpigmentation that also reduces the look of wrinkles without creasing...Coverage: Full..Finish: Natural..Formulation: Cream..Skin Type: Normal, Dry, Combination, and Oily..Highlighted Ingredients:.-Collagen: Skin-firming protein that supports skin elasticity -Hyaluronic Acid: Attracts moisture and plumps the look of fine lines and wrinkles  - Peptides: Help reduce the appearance of wrinkles for visibly smoother, firmer skin.Ingredient Callouts: Free of sulfates SLS and SLES, parabens, formaldehydes, formaldehyde-releasing agents, phthalates, mineral oil, retinyl palmitate, oxybenzone, coal tar, hydroquinone, triclosan, and triclocarban. This product is also vegan, cruelty-free, and gluten-free, comes in recyclable packaging...What Else You Need to Know: Just one dot of this creamy concealer delivers highly pigmented 24HR full coverage to conceal dark circles, skin redness, age spots and broken capillaries. Made with anti-aging peptides, hydrolyzed collagen, hyaluronic acid and vitamin E, it wonu2019t crack and visibly helps improve appearance of skin...Clinical Results:.-93% say product provides full coverage*.-86% say product corrects the look of imperfections*.*Results observed in a consumer study.
ingredients: PARAFFINUM LIQUIDUM / MINERAL OIL / HUILE MINERALE, PETROLATUM, VP/HEXADECENE COPOLYMER, SILICA DIMETHYL SILYLATE [NANO] / SILICA DIMETHYL SILYLATE, BIS-DIGLYCERYL POLYACYLADIPATE-2, OZOKERITE, PHENOXYETHANOL, TOCOPHERYL ACETATE, ALUMINUM HYDROXIDE, KAOLIN, NIACINAMIDE, SODIUM HYALURONATE, MAGNESIUM ASCORBYL PHOSPHATE, ASCORBYL PALMITATE, HYDROLYZED COLLAGEN, AQUA / WATER / EAU, TOCOPHEROL, GLYCERIN, STEARETH-20, CHLORHEXIDINE DIGLUCONATE, N-HYDROXYSUCCINIMIDE, SODIUM CITRATE, POTASSIUM SORBATE, PALMITOYL TRIPEPTIDE-1, CHRYSIN, PALMITOYL TETRAPEPTIDE-7, CITRIC ACID, BIOTIN
how_to_use: Suggested Usage:.-Warm a pinhead-size amount of concealer with fingers, tap onto skin and blend using your favorite IT Cosmetics makeup brush. We recommend Heavenly Luxe Dual Airbrush Concealer Brush #2. .-Just one dot of this full-coverage concealer goes a long way!

reviews.review_title: I liked it, it delivers what it promises
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: It has good coverage, is moisturizing and easy to use.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: creases any way you set it makes everything else around it run.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brunette hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: It says light tan but it is still pretty light. I have two different shades and I find them both too light and I have fair skin. I do like the coverage and it sits well on my skin. A little goes a long way, I barely put anything on my face and it's very full coverage. I will buy again, but will need to find the right shade. The only reason for the 4 stars is I think the bottle could be different. Maybe a different applicator.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I never thought a concealer could look so good. My skin looked like porcelain and it got rid of any texture. Super full coverage and thick and a perfect color match for my skin. It left my usually super dry skin hydrated as well which was a huge o

reviews.review_title: Excellent. A little goes a long way!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brunette hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Excellent product. I've tried other concealers, but I usually come back to this one. The only thing you have to remember is to use a good eye cream prior to application. I use the tiniest drop on the back of my hand, and I warm it up before pressing it into the skin under my eyes around the sides of my nose corners of the mouth. I generally use my fingers to apply it. A little goes a very long way. Less is more as this product is buildable.  It stays on all day. It's excellent for covering dark circles. I also really appreciate that it's in a tube . It keeps the product sanitary.  Highly recommend ud83dudc4c

reviews.review_title: Not good if you have the slightest wrinkle
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This product starts off greatu2014 full coverage, illuminating, my under eye darkness concealed u2014 but by the middle of the day it has furrowed and built up in the creases under my eye. Apparently this is for people who have no wrinkles. Iu2019m disappointed.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Quality of this product is no longer what it use to be.  First they discontinued the illuminating bye bye under eye and then they messed with the quality of this one.  :(

reviews.review_title: The only concealer I will ever need
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: If you have drier skin/are on acne medication and you struggle to find concealers that donu2019t end up making your skin flake, this is for you. It is super hydrating while still being full coverage and you only need the tiniest bit of product. I got my tube almost 6 months ago now and i wonu2019t be running out any time soon. I will never switch concealers!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This is the best under eye concealer i have ever used. The only con i have is that it does leave my skin looking oily after use but i just set it with powder and it looks great. Feels so good on the skin, great coverage, and lasts all day long!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I didnu2019t really like this concealer. Itu2019s extremely thick and doesnu2019t blend out very nicely but I can see how this may be a good thing for covering dark circles under the eyes and may work for others.Also causes creasing. It just wasnu2019t for me.

reviews.review_title: Not water proof not smear proof or all day wear
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I gave it a three because it does cover very well but it does not last all day and it comes off very easy u touch you face and your hand is covered in it

reviews.review_title: The holy grail of full coverage and hydrating!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This concealer has been my holy grail ever since they discontinued the Tarte Maracuja creaseless concealer in the tube! I have only now though found the perfect shade for me 21.5 medium nude...not too light, not too ashy, not too warm- just right. My undereyes love this product...it keeps me hydrated, moisturized and the shadows gone! I don't set it with anything I apply, let it soak, then buff in with a foundation brush. Please never discontinue this one!!! I may stock up just in case, never know what these companies will do!u2764ufe0f

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This is the 3rd time Iu2019ve bought this now. It is amazing. Lasts all day long, is moisturizing, and last forever!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This is literally the fullest coverage, creamiest, thickest and most long wearing concealer Iu2019ve ever tried. SOOOOOOO GOOD you need this

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I received this as a gift from it cosmetics, first impressions, I absolutely love it!! The consistency is very thick and a little goes a long way, the coverage is great, and it played with all other products very well.

reviews.review_title: I like it but it does crease.
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: It has great coverage and it super thick. A very very smaaaaaall amount goes a looooong way. It does crease on me.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: iu2019m so serious when i say itu2019s best concealer iu2019ve ever used! i recommend it to absolutely everyone, i might as well be a walking ad! i bought it for the first time over a year ago and only now have i cut the top off and started scooping product from the inside! it might be expensive, but the smallest bit goes a long way. it gives full coverage of my awful dark circles without looking full coverage or cakey. it doesnu2019t crease and lasts all day. i think everyone should use this stuff, if youu2019re not, youu2019re absolutely missing out!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This works really well as long as you have a good healthy skin consistency. If youu2019re dry it will show. If you need to exfoliate it will clump up

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Lowkey I hate it. Doesnu2019t dry down.. definitely not waterproof I feel like it comes off easily all the reviews were so good but a no from me

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I first bought the mini one, I love how full coverage and hydrating it is for my dry skin, so buying the full size was a must! An upgrade from my usual drug store concealer.

reviews.review_title: Dark circles girl transforms to an IT girl
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: A little goes a LONG way with this product, itu2019s the best concealer I have found. I need a very full coverage concealer since I have genetic dark circles. Even without setting powder it will not budge with minimal creasing. I love the packaging and it definitely worth the price for how long this product will last you. If you donu2019t have super dark under eyes, I donu2019t think I would suggest this sort of coverage for under your eyes since it is super thick. however it does also work well around the nose area to cover any redness if that is a problem area for you

reviews.review_title: must have for dark under eyes!!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: iu2019ve struggled my entire life with genetic dark circles and this product has changed my life! iu2019ve tried WAY too many concealers and none ever really worked. after trying this concealer, i havenu2019t used any other in years. and this stuff lasts SOOO long as well so iu2019ve only had to rebuy this once and that was to get a different shade. iu2019ll recommend this concealer over and over again, go get it!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love this product for more mature skin. Iu2019m in mid 40s. This does not go into the wrinkles of your eyes. Itu2019s super easy to apply and spread and layer (if you want to add more in a particular area). Finally found my replacement for the discontinued Clinique air brush concealer.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: absolutely flawless ud83eudd29this covers everything you want and it lasts the whole day!! more if a mat finish but not cakey

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I LOVE THIS SOOO MUCH! I used to use sephora's make no mistake concealer until they stopped selling it. I've been trying to find something like it for so long! When I tell you this is pretty much the same thing, I mean it! I love this concealer so much because I have such dark purple undereyes, and this camouflages them but doesn't make it obvious that I'm wearing concealer.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Like drywall mud; I use it for stage performances.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love this concealer so much! Definitely never going to be without!

reviews.review_title: Bye-bye for under-eye. Hello for nose u2018n chin!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, auburn hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Iu2019ll give this a 4 star for one reason: the thickness of this product works great on my nose and chin where my light coverage foundation tends to clog my pores with no real coverage. However, using it as an under-eye concealer causes creases every time. Itu2019s just too thick, even with the tiniest amount warmed up before application.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Super high coverage , does not need to be set w powder but also looks great w it

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: DOES NOT CREASE AND FULL COVERAGE. The perfect shade, and doesnu2019t smell bad.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I never sleep with makeup on but after a night out i did with this on and the next morning still had coverage! I use this as a foundation and a little goes a long way! Iu2019ve never love a product more. Your skin but better type finish <3

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Not as described. It caked under my eyes and made them look worse than they ever have with other similar products.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This concealer is AMAZING. I have been hunting for a concealer that is genuinely full coverageu2026 here it is! Will absolutely buy again. So good

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have big dark circles and this is the only concealer that has fully covered my circles and made my skin look white. Best concealer, it lasts all day and looks bomb with powder.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Itu2019s okay. Itu2019s too thick and hard to put on. It does the trick though

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: It does a good job of concealing dark under eyes and brightening them, but I find it always creases unless I use a setting powder. Itu2019s pretty thick and can look cakey when I do full face.

reviews.review_title: Disappointing - don't recommend for mature users
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Loyal user of the old product but found this one very disappointing.  If you don't have creases under your eyes you'd be fine to use but considering this is anti-aging it shouldn't stick so badly in creases.  I have to touch it up multiple times a day.  Don't think this is worth the money if you have mature skin.

reviews.review_title: Great for mature skin with fine lines
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This concealer works fantastic for me, dry and mature skin. Itu2019s the only concealer that works well with my fine lines. I donu2019t have particularly dark circles, but I would imagine it would conceal them very well. I recommend a serum as a base, make sure you warm a little in your fingertips first, and blend gently by tapping in. Recently, I discovered using a sponge to blend it in a little more works super well. A little goes a very long way, in fact, at first, itu2019s hard to get used to how little you really need, so for the price it is well worth it.

reviews.review_title: Where has this been my whole life?
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I made the switch from the nars creamy concealer and I am not looking back! Bought this on a whim and I am in love. Coverage is phenomenal. It is creamy and on the thicker side, but with baking, itu2019s fine. I am surprised that it doesnu2019t cause me to break out given its consistency. Highly recommend
Je lu2019adore tout simplement, cache tres bien les cernes. Le meilleur que ju2019ai essaye.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This concealer saved my life when it has come to covering acne! Because of its thick consistency, it covers up any and all redness I have! It doesnu2019t last all day, but lasts a good while! Would 100% recommend an

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: It leaves the area under the eyes very greasy and patchy, it cracks, I don't like the smell, it smells like Vaseline. It covers instantly but after 2 hours it starts to slide all over the face

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: A little goes a long way! Totally worth every penny and Iu2019ll never use another product daily like this!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This is very heavy duty and works well to hide my Sicilian dark circles. I like it when I am wearing traditional full-coverage foundation but it is too heavy for my regular routine thus the four stars. I will keep this for events or where I want to look u201cred carpet readyu201d because it is amazing. Also isnu2019t drying, which is surprising because usually the thick concealers are.

reviews.review_title: Awful for Oily Skin, itu2019s a no no.
reviews.review_buyer_description: Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This is by far the WORST concealer! My skin is oily and with this my face looks so shiny. Itu2019s sticky and the consistency isnu2019t right, will never buy again.  I will stick with the one I was using before!

reviews.review_title: Perfectly covers acne and small pimples.
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: For 25 years I have used a concealer from Clinique. It was so good for covering acne. They suddenly discontinued it. This is by far the best match I have found. I love it. It covers amazingly.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Ultra high coverage, and you literally need a pin hole size amount for under each eye. This tube will last me forever!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The only concealer thatu2019s ever worked for my dark circles and dry skin (under eyes). Literally have tried probably 100 other concealers that either cake or donu2019t blend smoothly. This is amazing.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Gray eyes, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This is pretty good for dry under eyes!  I don't know if I would say it is full coverage, even after a couple of layers.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have dark hereditary dark circles with easily crinkled skin. I needed a fuller coverage so I gave this a try.  I am loving this product!  I definitely need to blend this more than other concealers but the results are perfect!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Itu2019s very good in terms of concealing blemishes on your face but when using it for the under eye it really sets into the creases

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: THE BEST! Iu2019ve spent hundreds of dollars trying to find a concealer to cover my melasma and FINALLY came across this one! Love it so much.
Shades were not a good match for me. Either too dark or way too light. I thought it would be comparable to Cover Fx discontinued concealer but no where close.

reviews.review_title: A little goes a long way
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I have used several concealers. I often find myself going back to this one. You need the tiniest dot. It's best to warm it up on the back of your hand and then Pat it into your skin. Make sure you moisturized well in advance. Sometimes I said it was a little powder sometimes not. It lost all day in the coverage is fantastic. I like the fact that you squeeze it out of the tube not using a doe foot applicator. It's much more sanitary this way. One tube can literally last over 2 years! I use it under my eyes in the inner Corners as my eyes are a little bit deep set. I use it on my nose and blend outwards. A little dot on my chin and it's fantastic. You have to remember to keep blending. The warmth from your finger will melt it into your skin nicely. If you're finding a cakey it's because you have not warmed it up on the back of your hand and you have not kept blending it until it becomes one with your skin. Honestly it's such a good concealer

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This was way too thick for me so I returned it after a few uses. I donu2019t use foundation, so I think it is better suited for folks who do. I use a BB or CC cream and under eye concealer for hereditary dark circles. I tried different ways of applying the product based on reviews and all of them resulted in caking and creasing.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I love this! The coverage is excellent but very cakey so I wouldnu2019t buy it if you would want a natural makeup look.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love this full coverage concealer! TIP: warm the product up between 2 fingers before applying to the face! You will get the same coverage but it will be much more malleable as it is a thick consistency!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this concealer. It lasts all day, doesnu2019t crease or settle in fine lines, and provides full coverage. I mix it with a bit of moisturizer / face oil to help u201cthin it outu201d when applying it and it works amazingly.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I've been struggling with hormonal acne for the past two years - the kind where you don't want to leave the house unless you've got makeup on. Fortunately, this product has been by my side through it all and has helped me preserve a good deal of my self-confidence. The few people who HAVE seen my skin as-is are always impressed by the coverage I get with this - they say they wouldn't have known. While it doesn't make my skin look completely flawless, it comes darn close!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, notSure skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love this product, itu2019s the only concealer that gave me full coverage for my under eye circles. Iu2019ve received compliments for the difference it makes.

reviews.review_title: Always have it in my bag!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Genetically have darker undereye, and this is my go to! Iu2019ve learned that less is more with this product & always make sure you have moisturizer on before applying. This is a must have in my makeup bag!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Not for p.o.c, especially anyone brown skin and darker. Looked like chalk around my eyes.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Found the product to be very thick,  dry, and hard to blend. Also had a hard time choosing the correct color.

Un peu trop epais u00e0 mon gou00fbt, u00e7a entre dans les petites ridules et j'ai l'air plus vieille, fatiguee.  J'ai 61 ans et pas vraiment de rides mais ce produit n'est pas pour moi.  Par contre, pour cacher les cernes c'est super, mais trop c'est trop.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brunette hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have no idea why this is so slept on. Has way more coverage than my Armani concealer and the creasing is so minimal. I just use my finger to dab it on a little at a time until I build up the coverage I want. It works best when you don't cake it on and set it with tons of powder.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I bought this concealer because it is promoted as a concealer that with a single drop disappears your dark circles, but after trying it honestly it seems to me that it has the same coverage as other concealers that are not promoted the same, apart from the fact that the formula is very dense, and such maybe this is to achieve greater coverage but in that case I expected a better result

reviews.review_title: Finally a product that really covers dark circles
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brunette hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I saw immediate results with this concealer. A very little goes a long way! It hides my dark circles really well, full coverage that brightens and sits well with my makeup. This will be a staple in my makeup case.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Not happy at all. Reminded me of foundations from the 70u2019s-80u2019s. Very thick-more like stage make-up. Iu2019ve worked with sculpting clay thatu2019s more malleable. Difficult to remove.

reviews.review_title: One of the most crease-less concealers I own
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Great coverage, one of the most creaseless concealers I own, a breeze to apply with fingertips. You need very little powder over this one. If you try to set it with a lot of powder or with a sponge it will look dry and behave like any other concealer. You need to leave it hydrated so that it can stay looking great all day. I think they need more colors to fill in the gaps though. Also, zero breakouts :)

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have used this product many times.  It's a great product but for some reason the whole plastic tip comes off on the container or the container cracks eventually and, inevitably I am using a plastic baggie to keep it as I can no longer use the lid.  This has happened 3 times.  I even wrote to the company and they did nothing except send an auto response.  Very frustrating - not impressed as it's not a cheap item.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Amazing for all nighters,going swimming, and funerals. Just use a small amount though, if you use too much and you get wet or sweaty it can get patchy.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: this product is veryy thick but 100 full coverage if your looking for a full coverage concealer

reviews.review_title: Dry and doesnu2019t last all day
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I loved this at first when they helped me use it. It did cover my shadows. But itu2019s very dry and within a few hours I look crepey. Will not buy this again.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I really like how much coverage this provides. I wish it was more hydrating. It does stay on most of the day which is a plus. Downside is I donu2019t use it often and after 5 months the consistency has changed and itdoesnu2019t go

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I love this concealer it lasts the whole day. Itu2019s really thick and a little goes a long way. It doesnu2019t get dry and cakey. Works well for the t zone as well.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Best concealer Iu2019ve ever used very thick and moistest

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: you only need a small amount and it goes a long way. i wait for mine to dry a bit before blending and you do need use a good setting powder to make sure it doesnu2019t transfer!!

Je suis vraiment decue de ce produit, il ne laisse pas un beau fini sur la peau et j'ai l'impression que u00e7a accentue les ridules et les imperfections sur le visage. Tres gras, pas ideal pour peaux grasses.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Meh. Comes right off the second you sweat even the slightest and stays tacky feeling. Definitely does not last and is definitely not waterproof.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Yikes. This product is so thick and tacky, yet drying. Impossible to blend, makes fine lines and underlying dryness intensified, and just nothing positive to note.

reviews.review_title: Watery eye proof AND crease proof!! Eeep!!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: So, I am 36 and I have some lines under my eyes. I also have to WORST watery eyes. Itu2019s awful. I had gotten ready and left the house (eyeball watering) I tried so hard to control the watering but it completely broke apart my concealer and powder under my eye and left it completely bare. It looked AWFUL even my fiance was like u201cooo yeh I see what you meanu201d.   Desperately in Sephora I hunted for a u201cwaterproofu201d concealer. Found this one and it wasnu2019t quite as light of a shade as Iu2019d like but I bought it. I opened it and took a teeeeeny amount and just pressed it with my finger under my eye over the broken apart bare area andu2026 GURL it not only covered it but it looked flawless for about 6 hours after WITHOUT setting it with powder. My eye continued to leak throughout the evening as well and it didnu2019t budge!! So, this has become my absolute holy grail ride or die bestie now.   The photo is after I touched it up, after 6 hours on at the end of the night when I got home. You canu2019t even tell!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This concealer makes me look older than I am ugh. I have tried mixing it with the cc cream from It Cosmetics, and that helped a bit, but I donu2019t use this often at all. And it makes my dark circles look more dark.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Amazing got rid of my under eyes and was so smooth perfect for my makeup routine

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is excellent for aging skin. This is my momu2019s favorite concealer that I repurchased for her for Christmas. She says it does wonders covering dark spots and the under eyes!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Gray eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Best concealer Iu2019ve ever used. Stays all day, blends well, good on combo skin.

reviews.review_title: This must have in my makeup routine
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I really like this concealer, it matches my skin and really covers the skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: 19 years old and iu2019ve been using this for 3 years. Will crease if you put too much on eyelids/under eyes ,but firmly putting setting powder on it will help it keep in place and not crease.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Amazingly full coverage without caking. I never believed I could find an under eye concealer that did both. So long shape tape.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Truly the only concealer that actually hides my dark circles!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Product doesnu2019t do amazing at removing creasing, if anything it made my creases worse. But, itu2019s super full coverage. I really only use it to cover up my dark spots and beard shadow now.

reviews.review_title: I have to pass on this one.
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I tried using this product two or three times. Itu2019s very drying, has a sort working time and it settles into my fine line.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Very thick and hard to blend in my experience. Once blended out with a lot of effort, it does look nice but it still feels thick under the eyes. I donu2019t understand how itu2019s anti-aging but the waterproof part makes sense.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Worst under eye concealer.  Extremely dry doesnu2019t blend.  I cannot believe how many good reviews there are.

reviews.review_title: Difficult to use, but looks good and lasts.
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, auburn hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I've had this product for a year and a half now and have gone back and forth on it. At first I hated how thick and sticky it was, until I figured out how to use it. I literally use a tiny dot, then I pat it along my under eye with a dense concealer brush, then blend with my damp beauty blender. It sounds like a lot of work but I get the best results using it this way, and much less creasing. Because you need SO little, it lasts FOREVER. Overall, I appreciate the skin care/anti aging properties, and would repurchase. It really depends on how much effort you want to put into the application process, because it's more work than the average concealer, but definitely looks and performs better.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I absolutely love this under eye concealer and am surprised by the negative reviews. It doubles as an under eye highlighter for me also, but you can put some foundation over it if you don't want that, or perhaps another colour. It has great coverage that you can also use on acne or dark spots on your face. IT DOES NOT CREASE at all under my eyes so it looks so natural and flawless. I love the creamy consistency with just the right amount of thickness for great coverage. You just need such a tiny amount that one of these has lasted me now almost 4 or 5 years and I wear make-up pretty regularly, which is a really long time, it's probably expired but I am still using it and it still works great.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Tan skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Harder to blend or match skin with. Didn't look right for me, under eyes. When blended it didn't cover much of the circles. On my skin, it was noticeably whiter and cakey.

reviews.review_title: A little goes a long way
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this product, super thick and covers everything. A small amount of product goes a long way, it will last you a long time

reviews.review_buyer_description: Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is high pigmented so the coverage is incredible without putting on too much. Itu2019s also fairly waterproof. However, itu2019s oily and creases. Anytime Iu2019d wear eye makeup I have major issues with smudgin. At first I thought it was my eye makeup, but then I realized it was the concealer after trying a new brand of concealer

reviews.review_title: Will do if no other product is available
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: After using fir many weeks I must say it's an ok product.   I do find it can get a little cake if not blended in very well .  It don't hide as much as the product says, so a little disappointed with that being said..

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Terrible concealer. Terrible paste consistency. I used to like their formula that came in a blue jar. This one is disgusting and I canu2019t believe I paid $30 for it!! It isnu2019t worth $10!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: A fantastic full coverage concealer! It brightens and conceals and looks amazing under the eye

reviews.review_title: Good for a long wearing hours
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Used the product for the last month, live the coverage . Hav a good amount of moisturizer.working good until this moment

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I was surprised how thick it was, but the second time I only used a little bit  with a primer underneath and blended it with a brush. Iu2019m happy with it.ufffc provided a lot of coverage. I had the most success when I used a primer under. with a primer underneath and blended it with a brush. Iu2019m happy with it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This is the best tone-evening and dark circle-covering product Iu2019ve tried.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Very full coverage, I barely need any to cover both my under eyes and eyelids. However if you have dry under eyes this might emphasize that. I have very dark circles and it seems to cover them up well.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: When I need full under eye coverage this is my go to. Does not magnify lines. Does need to be set with a powder.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: It Cosmetics really hit the ball out of the park with this one. I've tried a number of high-priced concealers now, and this takes the cake! Because of allergies and heredity,  I have dark pigmentation under my eyes, and a good concealer is a must. the tube is small. However, a little goes a long way, so it's worth the price! ud83dude0a

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: after using this product, the coverage is not good. It doesnu2019t so anything for me and Iu2019ll be sticking with my tarte shape tape concealer.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Deep skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: 9/2023 So bad. I bought this with the u201chelpu201d of a Sephora staffer to cover acne/etc. On me, this product is just greasy, slipped around and never dried to matte as requested. I returned it the same day :(

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I tried several colors. I thought this would be great as a do have lines around my eyes. By the end of the work day this just looked cakey and tired.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: After using this product for a few weeks Iu2019ll say it does the job you donu2019t need a lot just a pea size and it will last for hours !!!

reviews.review_title: Donu2019t leave home without using it!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This really helps conceals the dark spots under my eyes. I feel more confident when taking pictures because my skin tone looks even.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I love this concealer. A little goes a looong way! Perfect for covering the dark circles and brown spots. I gave it a 5/5 because I have dry skin and this works well with my skin. If I had oily skin, I would invest in a lighter or medium build concealer . probably ues

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received this as a part of the bzzagent campaign. Itu2019s beautiful and applied well. My main issue is itu2019s a bit thick and went in to my fine lines I didnu2019t even know I had.
